physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No abnormalities on physical examination at the initial visit.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Systolic blood pressure remained in the 150- to 160-mm Hg range. Post-admission, the creatinine increased to 2.0 mg/dL.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Post-operative complications included difficulty using his right hand and unclear speech, indicating a cerebrovascular accident.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial improvement of vital signs after glucose administration; however, developed additional complications post-surgery.
